Items.Name: Expertise
Items.Description: General skill that gains exp along with other skills

Items.Name: Swords
Items.Description: The Swords skill encompasses all one-handed and two-handed swords.

Items.Name: Guns
Items.Description: The Guns skill encompasses all guns.

Items.Name: Clubs
Items.Description: The Clubs skill encompasses all one-handed and two-handed clubs.

Items.Name: Polearms
Items.Description: The Polearms skill encompasses all polearms.

Items.Name: Axes
Items.Description: The Axes skill governs combat applications of one-handed and two-handed axes.

Items.Name: Picks
Items.Description: The Picks skill governs combat applications of one-handed and two-handed picks.

Items.Name: Bows
Items.Description: The Bows skill encompasses all bows.

Items.Name: Knives
Items.Description: The Knives skill encompasses all knives.

Items.Name: Unarmed
Items.Description: The Unarmed skill governs all combat without weapons.

Items.Name: Logging
Items.Description: The Logging skill is increased through using one handed and two handed axes, both through combat and through harvesting lumber. Its benefits are focused on non-combat applications, whereas the Axes skill focuses on using a axe in combat.

Items.Name: Mining
Items.Description: The Mining skill is increased through using one handed and two handed picks, both through combat and through harvesting stone and ore. Its benefits are focused on non-combat applications, whereas the Picks skill focuses on using a pick in combat.

Items.Name: Harvesting
Items.Description: The Harvesting skill is used for general gathering without using an equipped item, such as gathering herbs, berries, water, etc.

Items.Name: Hunting
Items.Description: The Hunting skill focuses on hunting prey.

Items.Name: Fishing
Items.Description: The Fishing skill represents skill at fishing and provides bonuses while attempting to fish.

Items.Name: Exploration
Items.Description: The exploration skill deals with exploring the world map. It includes cartography.

Items.Name: Running
Items.Description: This skill is used for for simply moving around the game world.

Items.Name: Building
Items.Description: This skill is used for on building structures of any kind. Higher levels of the building skill increase the Health of buildings that the player builds and unlock additional building recipes.

Items.Name: Blacksmithing
Items.Description: This skill is used for making metal tools,  component parts, and miscelaneous goods.

Items.Name: Outfitting
Items.Description: This skill is specifically focused on crafting armor, clothing, and all cloth or leather items.

Items.Name: Cooking
Items.Description: This skill is used for all crafting for food. Increasing Cooking skill teaches the player additional recipes and improves the efficacy of their existing ones.

Items.Name: Alchemy
Items.Description: This skill is used for creating alchemical concoctions as well as transmuting items.

Items.Name: Carpentry
Items.Description: This skill is used for building and upgrading wooden items.

Items.Name: Stonecutting
Items.Description: This skill is used for building and upgrading stone items.

Items.Name: Writing
Items.Description: This skill is used for creating written documents such as Declarations of War, Land Claims, recipe books, spell books, and scrolls.

Items.Name: Leatherworking
Items.Description: This skill is used for crafting leather goods.

Items.Name: Tailoring
Items.Description: This skill is used for constructing cloth goods.

Items.Name: Weaponsmithing
Items.Description: This skill is used for constructing  metal weapons.

Items.Name: Armorsmithing
Items.Description: This skill is used for constructing  metal armor.

Items.Name: Engineering
Items.Description: This skill is used for making guns, explosives, siege engines, and other advanced machinery.
